website_summaries.verdict: A terrific booster seat that offers an exceptional combination of affordability and quality.
pros: Includes latch connectors to help you quickly secure the car seat
Integrated cup holders provide instant access to drinks and snacks
Features the SafeCell Impact Protection system, which consists of a steel frame, energy-absorbing base
Staged-release stitches slow and reduce forward movement in the event of a crash
cons: Straps may be uneven after they are tightened while a child is in the seat

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality seat for tall toddlers
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never purchased Britax before. However, my long torso-ed five year old had outgrown every seat on the market and I was not ready to move her to a seatbelt/ booster. Car seats for littles recommended this seat because the shoulder straps go to 3 inches higher than the other seats on the market. Mine was an open box with a visible ‘defect’ that I honestly can not find. The seat feels so safe and was SOOO easy to install. I’m SUPER impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Cormier

customer_reviews.title: Safe Product - The Most Important Detail
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for growing granddaughter. She was getting too cramped in the previous car seat. This is a beautiful color, which the little one loves. It is easy to clean, easy to install, and super comfortable while providing all the safety features that are important. We will be able to use this car seat until we convert it to a booster. I will very likely purchase the same product for her younger sister.
customer_reviews.author: Lyn Murdock

customer_reviews.title: Last seat until seat belts!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have this car seat in two colors and works well for 5 and 6 year olds who have outgrown Britax marathon and Advocate in height but not weight. My only hope is that they would add straps that don't twist like Recaro. Recaro had expanded ability but straps that are too short to fully realize it. We still use harness in main car because I feel it is safer in traffic. My kids love the cup holders. They are large so I don't know if you could fit 3 across a bench seat.
customer_reviews.author: LVATTY

customer_reviews.title: Britax knows car seats
customer_reviews.text: Was hesitant to spend the money for my five year old , not knowing how long we would use this , but when I received it , I knew I made a great choice. He will probably use it for the next 2-1/2-3 years and it’s tall enough and wide enough for him as well. Some other car seats are not. Fabric is easy to clean, My son prefers to ride In my car because he likes this car seat better than the one in the other car.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Durkee

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely get this one!!!
customer_reviews.text: We love this seat. My kids are very tall but skinny so the adjustable back is perfect for my growing kiddo. We also love the cup holders, the color, and the easy install. It did take me some time to find the anchor straps but they’re the easiest to put in. And the loop in the strap makes it easy to pull tight. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: JB Anderson

customer_reviews.title: NOT SAFE!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this seat March 2019 and loved it. Now it’s just June 2019 and we just returned it. Two times in a week the 5 point harness straps popped out when the car seat was in use. I didnt feel safe putting my toddler in this seat after that. We barely pulled the straps to loosen it and it popped out of the back of the seat where it was supposed to be secure. For the price we expected it to be a better seat.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Grandbabies Love these seats
customer_reviews.text: I spent hours researching carseats for my grandbabies. These were highly rated for safety. The are easy to install, not too heavy but solid. I have twin 3 year old grandbabies and they love them. Added bonus they are easy to clean as well.
customer_reviews.author: SouthernSweet

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this booster!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this booster. It has excellent safety ratings, anchors and it reclines slightly. Based on other reviews they say it’s very comfortable on long car rides but we haven’t taken a long car ride yet to know for ourselves. My son is 5 and he loves it. Can buckle and unbuckle himself easily using the harness. I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Daughter and I both love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this seat, it is heavy but that's because of the safety feature of a steel frame. It's easy to install. My 5 year old that's in 7/8 yo clothes still fits comfortably in the HARNESS. It goes up to higher height/weight than other seats and I love that for my autistic daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Chzck

customer_reviews.title: Kid Approved
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 4 years old and barely 30 pounds. This carseat is perfect for her. She loves the blue color and the cupholders!
customer_reviews.author: lemmonysnippets

customer_reviews.title: Missing latch strap, useless without it
customer_reviews.text: I'm a loyal Britax customer, I love their safety ratings. However, when I received this carseat, it did not have the latch strap needed. I tried to thread the seatbelt through the back, but couldn't get a tight enough setting. My husband and I ended up getting a latch strap, and now it works well, but I was disappointed that we weren't given one...
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Great seat
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 of these for my kids aged 3 and 5. They both love them! The cup holders are great and the kids are able to buckle themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Ann Boyle

customer_reviews.title: Britax fam
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a Britax. I bought this to switch my son which outgrew his last one. This is very comfortable and easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Great for transitioning larger toddlers.
customer_reviews.text: Found this seat to be super easy to install and my toddler had no issue transitioning to this seat. I needed something that would grow with him and keep him contained without concern of escape as he's autistic and VERY CURIOUS.
customer_reviews.author: bitiloli

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again
customer_reviews.text: All toddler car seats are a pain to install, but this one is so much easier. Heavy frame, sturdy, comfy, recline function works, but moving it back to upright takes a patience.
customer_reviews.author: G. Yanez

customer_reviews.title: Great seat!
customer_reviews.text: Great seat! We have two, one for each car and his grandparents have the same seat. Easy to install with isofix as well as with a seat belt in my husbands car that does not have isofix
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great 5-point harness booster car seat
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and as described. This was the perfect carseat for my daughter who is not yet big enough for a single booster seat and I feel comfortable with her being in the 5-point harness. This was actually the second one we purchased for my husbands car. It was easy to install and my daughter loves how there are 2 cup holders!
customer_reviews.author: ashlee

customer_reviews.title: Seatbelt install was hard and never tight enough.
customer_reviews.text: If you're installing with the seatbelt ( Which you have to do if your child is 40 pounds or more) This seat is NOT worth the money. I was unable to install the seat tightly, so I took it to a car seat technician who said that this seat was just not going to be safe in our car. 2013 Ford Escape. I'm sure it would be fine if you were just using for the booster, but for a taller child with the harness, this is basically useless.
customer_reviews.author: Zachery williams

customer_reviews.title: Great, heavy, secure
customer_reviews.text: Love this car seat. Sturdy and strong car seat. Heavy so not ideal for transitioning between cars or for travel. Seems comfortable fit. Probably could use a bit more cushion on the seat. Tether is easy to use and no latch but very secure with seat belt.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super happy to buy it
customer_reviews.text: Super happy to buy it! It fits my 6 y.o she is 48" and 60 lb Im using it with 5 harness restrain and she seats confy and likes her new seat. Easy to install!
customer_reviews.author: Olga  S Kormuskina

customer_reviews.title: As expected, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Love Britax, use them for all of our car seats. This booster is no different
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Grandson's Seat
customer_reviews.text: He love the seat, easy to use and very safe.
customer_reviews.author: Franklyn

customer_reviews.title: Love this seat!
customer_reviews.text: Best seat for an older child to feel they have a bigger kid seat with the same safety for parents!
customer_reviews.author: Michele Adams

customer_reviews.title: Nothing like the Britax Pinnacle in my husband’s van
customer_reviews.text: Very hard to install and you must use seatbelt if child weighs over 40 pounds. Nothing like the Britax Pinnacle in my husband’s van.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca J. Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Love my Britax
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, clean and very secure. We have two of these and love this car seat. A bit heavy for airline travel but all in all, you won't find a better car seat
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer N.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and worth buying. we are totally happy with this seat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS SEAT.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this carseat for almost a year. Its still great and super easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: So hard to tighten and loosen the straps. Could ...
customer_reviews.text: So hard to tighten and loosen the straps. Could never get the straps tight enough for me to feel safe having my son in it. Returning it!
customer_reviews.author: Kenners

customer_reviews.title: Great car seat
customer_reviews.text: Great car seat. Fits my 48" tall four year old
customer_reviews.author: AMZbuyer

customer_reviews.title: Nice size for a bigger kid
customer_reviews.text: Lots of room for a bigger five year old. He isn’t smashed in it but he is safely secured.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Must be patient when you install
customer_reviews.text: It took me a while to install😔😔, however,my 2 years old son loves it and that is all it matters😁
customer_reviews.author: Jack Lin

customer_reviews.title: Beware, this thing feels like a $50 seat.
customer_reviews.text: Wow, can't do latch now due to regs and this seat just won't tighten with a retractable lap belt. Britax, why on earth would this seat not have a lockoff? Ohh yeah, because it's only $180. Feels like a $50 seat!
customer_reviews.author: Im a scientist!

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money for safety
customer_reviews.text: Not as easy as the click-tight version which is disappointing but i don't take it out of my car enough for that to be a big issue. This is a great seat and as long as you use it right (not too young/small) and read the manual i feel this is a VERY safe seat! my son loves it (I let him pick the design so he wouldn't fight getting in the car) and so do I!!
customer_reviews.author: Hayley

product_meta.title: Britax Pioneer Harness-2-Booster Car Seat, Oasis [Discontinued]
product_meta.description: Safety, comfort and convenience make the Pioneer an exceptional Harness 2 Booster Seat. Car seat installation is made simple with easy on/easy off LATCH connectors that lock into place with an audible click and are easily released with the push of a button. In the Pioneer Harness 2 Booster Car Seat you are surrounded in safety. This booster seat features the patented Britax SafeCell Impact Protection system which includes a steel frame, energy absorbing base, V shaped tether to minimize seat rotation and staged release stitches that slow and reduce forward movement in the event of a crash. Britax designed the Frontier ClickTight Seat with 2 strong layers of side energy absorption; a deep foam lined shell and head protection will shield your child from the most severe type of collision. Two integrated cup holders keep drinks and snacks within reach and are easy to clean between rides. The 9 position quick adjust harness grows along with your child and it’s easy to transition from a harness to a belt positioning booster by tucking the buckles and straps within the seat. The Pioneer Harness 2 Booster Seat can be used in Harness Mode for children 2 years old and 25 to 70 lbs or in Booster Mode for children 40 to 110 lbs. Child standing height using the harness 30 58” and using booster mode 45 62”. Dimensions minimum 19 W x 28 H x 21 D, maximum 19 W x 35 H x 21 D inches. Seat width 12”. 9 Position harness slot heights 12.5” to 20.5”. May not be compatible with all vehicles, see user guide.
feature_bullets: Safe Cell Impact Protection is a safety system including a steel frame, energy absorbing base and patented V shaped tether
2 layers of Side Impact Protection are formed by a deep energy absorbing shell, quick adjust head protection absorb energy and shield your child from the most severe type of collision
Easy on/off Lower Anchors lock into place with a click and are easily released with the push of a button
Color coded, easy access belt paths simplify vehicle seat belt installation.Buckle Strap Depths 7.0 inches / 9.0 inches
Quick adjust 2 position buckle moves outward easily as your child gets bigger

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars62 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
